|stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.5 |pwr_poe_type = af |pwr_poe = |pwr_poe_amp = |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn |defaulip = |defaultlogin = |defaultpass = |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = SerComm |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 08/26/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;AR9580; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== :''AP-115'' (integral antenna model) "AJX00C-1.6" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos.
"AQD00N0C-1.6" appears to be silkscreened on the RP-SMA connector boards. :"PCB P/N: 21101938 REV: 01" and "(C) 2013 ARUBA NETWORKS" :looks to be on the bottom of the board. It may be using QCA9558 and a AR9380/AR9580 something else. :It would seem probable this device is ''[[QCA]]'' based. Per the FCC test report.. *The EUT is using ''ArubaOS'' (''AOS'') 6.3.0.0 *The stated dimensions are [[Dimensions::170 mm x 170 mm x 45 mm]] *The stated weight is [[Weight::1 kg]] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/aruba/aruba_ap-115 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ath79 |subtarget = generic |arch = mipsel_24kc |support_started_version = ? |current_supported_version = 23.05.2 |image_too_big = |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here [[Category:English Documentation]]
